alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 3:55PM CST until January 02 at 4:15PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN PERRY...CENTRAL CONWAY...NORTHEASTERN YELL AND SOUTHERN POPE COUNTIES... At 354 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Russellville to near Carden Bottoms to 9 miles southeast of Ola, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Morrilton... Perryville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Oppelo... Perry... Adona... Sequoya Park... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Hattieville... Petit Jean State Park... Jerusalem... Lake Dardanelle... Galla Creek WMA... Casa... Aplin... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
